cause.description:
Packard Children's Hospital relies on generous donors to help provide the most advanced medical care to the 33,000 children who come through our doors each year. Donations also ensure that we never turn away a local child who needs our services, regardless of their family's income or insurance status.
To make a secure gift online, go to www.supportLPCH.org.
For more information about the Hospital, please visit www.lpch.org
You can become a fan of Packard Children's and see what's going on at the hospital: http://www.facebook.com/pages/Palo-Alto-CA/Lucile-Packard-Childrens-Hospital-at-Stanford/24321622660?ref=ts
Thank you for supporting Lucile Packard Children's Hospital!
1. Advancing a child-friendly, family-centered approach to care.
2. Fostering innovation and translating research into new cures for children's diseases.
3. Serving our community through outreach and advocacy.
4. Training future leaders in pediatric medicine.
cause.mission: Located in Palo Alto, CA, Packard Children's is an internationally-recognized pediatric and obstetric hospital devoted entirely to the care of babies, children, adolescents, and expectant mothers.
cause.name: Lucile Packard Children's Hospital at Stanford
